Summary: Dark grey with a bright light at one end.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hauser
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my family were driving into the parking lot at Howser lake.I was looking at the lake,andI then spotted a massive disc-shaped object hovering over the lake. My mom said afterwards that she had seen something above the lake and assumed it was an ariplane. It was dark grey mettallic with a bright light at one end. I turned my head no more then 2 seconds away from it to tell the others. I looked back and it disappeered. I was eleven and i am now tweleve. I dont just see things it was real.
